name: Throw The Dice
description:
Throw the dice to defeat enemies, but watch out! what you roll determines what type of enemy spawns.

Defend the heart against to foes.

ROLL SPAWNS:

1 = Falling "baby"
2 = Car
3 = Next Gen Fish AI
4 = Bouncing ball
5 = Pilot
6 = Heals the heart

A roll occurs every time you land on the floor or defeat an enemy.

TIPS:

Combo-ing enemies without touching the floor increases the point multiplier per kill.

CREDITS:

Music by Kevin Macleod.

Thanks to Twitch chat for the help <3

Thanks to Quetzal for the Curtain texture.
